item.description: ğŸ“• Jagjeevan Living Larger than Life ğŸ“• Jagjeevan: Living Larger Than Life is a heartfelt tribute to the extraordinary life and timeless wisdom of Shri Jagguramâ€”an enlightened soul whose values shaped generations. Blending personal memories with profound life lessons, it captures the essence of a man who lived with humility, discipline, compassion, and unwavering purpose. Through ten insightful chapters, the book explores heritage, resilience, responsibility, inner strength, family unity, conflict resolution, gratitude, and the power of oneâ€™s actions.

item.title: How Small, How Big: Seeing Life Through the Lens of the Universe
item.author: thinkuldeep@gmail.com (Kuldeep Singh)
item.description: After a few hectic months, I recently visited a camping site with my family â€” a truly refreshing experience being close to nature. The trip was hosted by Camp Gopika and accompanied by Astrostop, adding a unique touch to our stay. The serene environment gave me time to reflect on life and also work on the final touches of my upcoming book, ğŸ“• â€œJagjeevan â€“ Living Larger than Lifeâ€, which tells the story of my great-grandfather and his belief that travel is essential for learning and introspection.
